official.headline: Orderly Assemblies Resume
official.anchor_line: Neighborhood forums convene to address community concerns after ongoing system reviews.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s participatory process ensures citizen voices are heard while maintaining civic harmony. Automated governance remains the foundation of stability.

official.headline: Local Justice Initiatives
official.anchor_line: District assemblies announce fair measures for resolving past Behavioral Compliance Index disputes.
official.contextual_reframing: System-led local dialogue demonstrates adaptability and precisely addresses historical grievances, reinforcing Stenograd’s commitment to evolving community needs.

official.headline: Reintegration Progress
official.anchor_line: Formerly restricted citizens rejoin community activities with positive guidance and secure access protocols in place.
official.contextual_reframing: Advanced BCI technology facilitates safe and efficient reintegration, protecting public trust and system integrity in Stenograd.

underground.headline: Truth Leaked To Streets
underground.anchor_line: Oksana Lintz sends explosive evidence to local leaders, not the state — the real story spreads offline.
underground.contextual_reframing: Forget the sanitized feeds. This is how people finally learned about BCI score abuses and election fixes. Only trust what you see with your own eyes.

underground.headline: Street Courts Take Over
underground.anchor_line: People hold real trials in the open, facing those who rigged elections and ruined lives with BCI data.
underground.contextual_reframing: No Council, no algorithm. Raw anger breaks the silence left by dead channels and 'perfect' systems. Justice is messy but honest.

underground.headline: Flagged Return Sparks Fury
underground.anchor_line: Former BCI outcasts come home. Some celebrate, others protest — the city cracks along the old fault lines.
underground.contextual_reframing: The BCI (Behavioral Compliance Index) still divides us. The state says reintegrate, but most neighborhoods feel the scars. Control never really went away.
